title: [Bug]: Svelte - Auto-docs includes all inherited HTMLAttributes when using utility types on svelte/elements
body: ### Describe the bug When creating a Svelte component with Storybook in a Vite environment, the automatic documentation generation for props behaves inconsistently depending on how types from `svelte/elements` are extended. Specifically, when using a TypeScript utility types like `Omit<>` to extend the attributes, Storybook's documentation includes the entire list of inherited attributes, flooding the props table. This does not happen when the interfaces from `svelte/elements` are extended/type-intersected "as is". ### Reproduction link https://stackblitz.com/edit/github-vat7p589?file=src%2Fstories%2FExtendsModifiesProps.stories.svelte ### Reproduction steps 1. Go to the link above. 2. Open `ExtendsModifiesProps` component story in the preview. 3. Notice that all the inherited HTML attributes are displayed in the generated args table. 4. In contrast, view the `ExtendsProps` component story in the preview. 5. Notice that the inherited HTML attributes are properly ignored. ### Expected behavior The generated documentation should only display the component's own, explicitly defined props (e.g., `label`), regardless of whether `Omit<>` or other utility types are used. The long list of inherited HTML attributes should be omitted from the primary controls table to keep the component's API clear and usable. ### System ```bash System: OS: Linux 6.8 Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS 24.04.2 LTS (Noble Numbat) CPU: (14) x64 Intel(R) Core(TM) Ultra 5 125U Shell: 3.7.0 - /usr/bin/fish Binaries: Node: 22.16.0 - ~/.local/share/mise/installs/node/22.16.0/bin/node npm: 10.9.2 - ~/.local/share/mise/installs/node/22.16.0/bin/npm pnpm: 10.11.1 - ~/.local/share/mise/installs/node/22.16.0/bin/pnpm Browsers: Chrome: 138.0.7204.183 npmPackages: @storybook/addon-a11y: ^9.0.15 => 9.0.15 @storybook/addon-docs: ^9.0.15 => 9.0.15 @storybook/addon-svelte-csf: ^5.0.4 => 5.0.4 @storybook/addon-themes: ^9.0.15 => 9.0.15 @storybook/addon-vitest: ^9.0.15 => 9.0.15 @storybook/sveltekit: ^9.0.15 => 9.0.15 eslint-plugin-storybook: ^9.0.13 => 9.0.13 storybook: ^9.0.15 => 9.0.15 ``` ### Additional context _No response_
